verbs.description: [ARG0: red sox] [V: take] [ARG1: world series trophy] [ARGM-GOL: to manager puerto rican hometown boston red sox manager alex cora took the 2018 world series trophy to puerto rico on saturday to celebrate the team championship in his hometown of caguas an area hit hard by hurricane maria] it was [ARGM-GOL: hurricane maria puerto rico misiones alex cora boston boston red sox puerto rico red sox world series]
